row.process:
:SET &PROGRAM# = "&PROG_LC#" :SET &INIFILE# = "&PROGRAM#.ini" :SET &OPTIONS# = "&INIFILE#" :SET &PG3_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'GarantiefondsVoraus_BerechFondsAnlage' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&PG3_BESCHREIBUNG#.log' :SET &FRMDKURS# = '1' :SET &FRMDWAEHR# = 'EURO' :SET &INPF03# = '&EXTOUTFILE1#_1' :SET &TARF03# = '&INDIR#/TARIFDAT.DAT' :SET &DATF03# = '&INDIR#/BSTNDDAT.DAT ' :SET &STRBTAB1# = '&INDIR#/STRBTAB1.DAT ' :SET &STRBTAB2# = '&INDIR#/STRBTAB2.DAT ' :SET &STRBTAB3# = '&INDIR#/STRBTAB3.DAT ' :SET &STRBTAB4# = '&INDIR#/STRBTAB4.DAT ' :SET &AVSTTAB2# = '&INDIR#/AVSTTAB2.DAT' :SET &AVSTTAB3# = '&INDIR#/AVSTTAB3.DAT' :SET &LOGF03# = '&LOGFILE#' :SET &PRTF03# = '&DATDIR#/&PG3_BESCHREIBUNG#.out'
! INI-FILE erstellen cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# TRACE = &TRACE# BESCHREIBUNG = &PG3_BESCHREIBUNG# FRMDKURS = &FRMDKURS# FRMDWAEHR = &FRMDWAEHR# INPF03 = &INPF03# TARF03 = &TARF03# DATF03 = &DATF03# STRBTAB1 = &STRBTAB1# STRBTAB2 = &STRBTAB2# STRBTAB3 = &STRBTAB3# STRBTAB4 = &STRBTAB4# AVSTTAB2 = &AVSTTAB2# AVSTTAB3 = &AVSTTAB3# LOGF03 = &LOGF03# PRTF03 = &PRTF03# ANLDATUM = &ANLDATUM# KAUFDATUM = &KAUFDATUM# __EOF__
:INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB
